descriptionHtml:
[size=2]This is a simple mod that adds a smelter to Riverwood, just outside of the forge area. 

This mod should be compatible with aplestormy's [url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18952/?tab=3&selected_game=110&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fid%3D18952%26user%3D2%26gid%3D110&pUp=1]Towns and Villages Enhanced - Riverwood[/url] as well as any other mods that effect Riverwood. If however, you should find a bug or significant clipping issue, let me know and I will fix it!

[/size]TO INSTALL:

Just unzip the file and place the .esp in the "data" folder.
author: NobleD
